programme.title: Mv Seleksi Sinema Ep10
programme.desc: Seleksi lagu-lagu menarik untuk hiburan anda

programme.title: Rama - Rama
programme.desc: Mengisahkan Sahira, yang hidupnya terkongkong dalam mengejar ilmu keduniaan. Sahira tidak berpeluang untuk hidup bersosial dengan rakan sebaya. Adakah Sahira akan terus dikongkong?

programme.title: Bimbing Aku Baca Salawat Bu
programme.desc: Sejak berkenalan dengan Bandi, ketua geng motosikal, Hidup Anisa menjadi kucar-kacir. Dia sering ponteng sekolah, tidak mahu lagi membantu ibunya, malah tidak pernah mengaji Al-Quran lagi. Rupanya, Anisa telah menyertai Bandi melepak bersama rakan-rakannya daripada geng motor.

programme.title: Crime Kings
programme.desc: Seorang budak kaya-pergi-penyangak bertindak sebagai Robin Hood dalam kehidupan sebenar. Melindungi orang kaya, melindungi orang miskin, bermain permainan kucing-dan-tikus dengan polis tempatan, dalam karya zaman penuh aksi ini yang diilhamkan oleh kisah benar dari Thailand 1940-an.

programme.title: Variety Jom Wayang S12 Ep19
programme.desc: Anda kaki wayang? Hos Elyssa Alia membawakan anda informasi menarik bagi filem-filem terpilih tempatan dan luar negara dengan cara yang berbeza yang pastinya akan membuat anda ketawa dan santai sambil menonton Jom Wayang

programme.title: Mv Seleksi Sinema Ep2
programme.desc: Seleksi lagu-lagu menarik untuk hiburan anda

programme.title: Jodoh Wassap
programme.desc: Kematian isteri Pak Ali, Bonda Mar, membuatkan keluarga mereka terlalu sedih. Anak sulungnya, Along menghadiahkan smartphone baru kepada ayahnya untuk mengisi masa lapang. Namun sejak memiliki smartphone, Pak Ali banyak sertai group whatsapp rakan-rakan sekolah lama. Melalui group whatsapp Pak Ali telah berkenalan dengan Martina, gadis kacukan.

programme.title: Danau Hitam
programme.desc: Tengah malam, didalam hutan di suatu tempat, sekelompok orang melakukan eksekusi terhadap seorang gadis kecil yang dianggap membawa sial. Mereka meletakkan gadis itu di dalam peti, menguncinya, lalu melemparkan peti itu di tengah danau dan menjelaskan tenggelam. Setelah itu kabut tebal tiba-tiba datang menyelimuti danau diikuti dengan teriakan yang keras.

programme.title: Sempurnanya Istri Yang Sabar
programme.desc: Mengisahkan Hanum, yang sabar dan tabah menghadapi dugaan suaminya yang terkena ilmu hitam.

programme.title: Tmo Dari Kerana Mata
programme.desc: Saksikan di sebalik tabir pembikinan Filem Dari Kerana Mata

programme.title: It'S Me
programme.desc: Kisah remaja sekolah tentang hubungan dan hubungan cinta

programme.title: Mv Seleksi Sinema Ep10
programme.desc: Seleksi lagu-lagu menarik untuk hiburan anda

programme.title: Love Affair
programme.desc: Tee sering bertengkar dengan isterinya Thom, yang baru sahaja dikahwininya. Dia memutuskan untuk terbang ke London. Disana, dia jatuh cinta dengan seorang gadis muda dan cantik bernama Jao Noi. Thom pula mengandung tetapi tidak mahu membebankan Tee. Apakah kesudahan dari cerita ini?

programme.title: Adnan Sempit 2
programme.desc: Mengisahkan tentang Adnan, seorang penunggang motosikal jalanan yang yatim piatu dan dijaga oleh bibinya. Di pihak lain, Nadia dilahirkan dalam keluarga yang kaya dan kini memiliki pekerjaan yang stabil. Kedua-dua individu yang berlatarbelakangkan dunia yang berbeza ini akhirnya bertemu secara kebetulan dan terjalin hubungan antara mereka.

programme.title: Adnan Sempit 3
programme.desc: Menyaksikan Adnan berkahwin dengan cinta zaman kanak-kanaknya, Nadia, manakala Bobby pula berkahwin dengan Wawa. Adnan juga semakin mahir menguruskan perniagaannya sendiri. Walau bagaimanapun, kedua-dua pasangan ini segera menyedari bahawa perkahwinan bukan sekadar berkongsi rumah bersama seseorang, tetapi lebih daripada itu.

programme.title: Tayangan Perdana Alibi
programme.desc: Nazri berdepan situasi getir apabila isterinya, Bella, dan anaknya, Ayu, tanpa sengaja membunuh Johan, lelaki yang mengganggu Ayu. Dalam keadaan terdesak, mereka memutuskan untuk menyembunyikan mayat Johan. Dengan sedikit pengalaman dalam menghadapi situasi sukar, Nazri merangka alibi untuk keluarganya agar tidak ditangkap oleh polis, dengan bantuan Ray, pekerja upahan di rumahnya. Namun, Ray mula menunjukkan sisi gelapnya apabila dia mengancam mereka dengan video pembunuhan Johan yang dirakam secara rahsia. Dalam usaha menyelamatkan keluarganya, Nazri terpaksa berjuang melawan Ray, yang sebenarnya adalah seorang sosiopat berbahaya

programme.title: Takut Ke Tak?
programme.desc: Lima pelajar jurusan filem merancang untuk melakukan penggambaran di sebuah rumah berhantu, namun satu demi satu kejadian yang sama seperti kebanyakan filem seram berlaku kepada mereka lalu mereka perlu membuat keputusan penting takut ke tak?

programme.title: Hantu Tenggek
programme.desc: Sekumpulan penipu yang diketuai oleh Tariq yang berpura-pura mengusir tempat berhantu telah diperas ugut oleh Tuan Sidek, seorang pemaju bangunan. Mereka perlu meyakinkan pesaing Tuan Sidek bahawa bangunan tertentu berhantu apabila mereka terperangkap di dalamnya. Kecuali mereka tidak perlu meyakinkan kerana bangunan itu benar-benar dihantui oleh roh yang tidak tenteram. Roh memerlukan bantuan mereka untuk memenuhi hasrat terakhirnya

programme.title: Rock 4:Rockers Never Die
programme.desc: Band rock baharu RIMBA BARA 2 memulakan perjalanan untuk menghidupkan semula legasi RIMBA BARA dengan bantuan pengurus mereka, Dio (bekas roadie RIMBA BARA).

programme.title: Tayangan Perdana Wok
programme.desc: Mariam dilahirkan bisu dan lembam. Satu satunya anak tunggal Maimon dan arwah Wak Jahid. Hidup dalam serba serbi kekurangan. Mengutip plastik kaca dan besi untuk imbuhan. Sini sana ada yang memberi bantuan. Mereka hidup bahagia berduaan. Kepala ikan bilis menjadi makanan kesukaan. Keadaan kesihatan Maimon semakin merosot. Maimon berhasrat untuk mencarikan calon buat Wok. Yakin dengan adanya lelaki yang sudi memperisterikan anaknya yang hodoh dan bodoh segalanya tentu tidak merisaukan dia andai mata sudah terpejam selamanya. Pelawaan dari kenalan rakannya untuk memperisterikan Wok, adalah satu berita yang sangat menggembirakan. Deris akad nikah dengan Wok dan segera dibawa pulang ke rumahnya di kota walaupun Wok seolah takut dan tidak mahu berenggang dengan Maimon dia akur kerana itu yang diminta oleh Maimon. Sekaki melangkah ke rumah Deris, Wok diheret kejam ke dalam bilik tanpa sempat menanggalkan tudungnya. Dikerjakan secukupnya itulah tanda malam pertama. Diperkosa dengan rakus oleh suami sendiri. Deris adalah bekas banduan yang cuba untuk berubah tetapi tidak mampu bertahan dan isthiqomah Deris. Deris lelaki sex maniak dan mengalami tekanan dan pelbagai penyakit mental setelah sekian lama duduk di jel akibat kesalahan merogol.

programme.title: Anak Jalanan Reborn
programme.desc: Boy mengalami kemalangan yang menyebabkan dia menjalani rawatan di hospital selama setahun. Sementara itu, Reva, kekasih Boy, meninggalkan dunia geng motosikal dan kini bekerja di syarikat milik mendiang ayahnya sebagai pengarah utama.

programme.title: Bukan Cinta Malaikat
programme.desc: Berasal dari Bandung, Reyhan pergi ke kawasan konflik di Timur Tengah untuk kerja sukarela. Di sana, dia membantu seorang wanita Malaysia bernama Dewi dan jatuh cinta padanya. Apabila Dewi kembali ke negaranya, Reyhan memutuskan untuk mencarinya dan melamarnya. Namun, Dewi sudah mempunyai kekasih. Sementara itu, rakan zaman kanak-kanak Reyhan, Aliyah, turut menyimpan perasaan terhadapnya.

programme.title: Abang Long Fadil 1
programme.desc: Abang Long Fadil, seorang lelaki yang sentiasa berangan bahawa kehidupannya seperti seorang gangster. Namun, apabila sahabat baiknya, Malik, dipenjarakan, pelbagai kekacauan mula tercetus dan angan-angannya mungkin tidak lagi jauh dari realiti.

programme.title: Abang Long Fadil 2
programme.desc: Kisah tentang Fadil yang terjerumus ke dalam dunia mafia yang diketuai oleh Taji Samprit dan anaknya, Wak Doyok. Satu insiden menyebabkan Inspektor Wahab dan Inspektor Shuib mengesyaki Fadil sebagai Tiger, seorang pembunuh upahan profesional.

programme.title: Tayangan Perdana Alibi
programme.desc: Nazri berdepan situasi getir apabila isterinya, Bella, dan anaknya, Ayu, tanpa sengaja membunuh Johan, lelaki yang mengganggu Ayu. Dalam keadaan terdesak, mereka memutuskan untuk menyembunyikan mayat Johan. Dengan sedikit pengalaman dalam menghadapi situasi sukar, Nazri merangka alibi untuk keluarganya agar tidak ditangkap oleh polis, dengan bantuan Ray, pekerja upahan di rumahnya. programme.title: Jangan Pandang Belakang Congkak
programme.desc: Tiga pemuda menerima sepucuk surat masing-masing daripada seorang lelaki misteri bernama Pak Sudir yang menjemput mereka ke rumahnya. Mereka ialah Punai, seorang pemandu; Asmat, seorang tukang cuci di studio rakaman; dan Johan, seorang pelakon tambahan. Pada tarikh yang ditetapkan, ketiga-tiga mereka tiba di rumah Pak Sudir dan mendapati bahawa Pak Sudir sebenarnya adalah datuk mereka. Mereka diberitahu bahawa mereka akan mewarisi semua harta Pak Sudir jika berjaya memenuhi syarat yang ditetapkan. Syaratnya ialah mereka perlu tinggal di rumah itu selama tiga malam berturut-turut dan tidak boleh menyentuh apa-apa di dalam rumah tersebut, terutamanya "congkak" lama. Sejak malam pertama mereka di sana, kampung yang aman sejak kematian Pak Sudir tiba-tiba menjadi huru-hara.

programme.title: Jangan Pandang Belakang Congkak 2
programme.desc: Setelah berjaya memulihkan Punai (Cat Farish), Asmat (Lan Pet-pet) dan Johan (Shaheizy Sam) serta berjaya menewaskan Mustika dalam JPBC yang lalu, Pak Mor yang cedera itu terus menuju ke anak sungai. Pak Mor dibantu oleh Mustika (Lisa Surihani) dan berpakat untuk merampas harta Pak Sudir.

programme.title: Cinta 2 Pilihan Ep110
programme.desc: Fathir dan Sukma merupakan pasangan suami isteri yang hidup bahagia dalam kesederhanaan di Magelang. Mereka mempunyai seorang anak perempuan bernama Zahra. Fathir bekerja sebagai kontraktor, dan Sukma hanya seorang suri rumah. Pada suatu hari, Fathir menerima projek besar. Malangnya, terdapat masalah dengan projek itu. Masalah timbul apabila Zahra disahkan menghidap penyakit kronik. Doktor mencadangkan agar Zahra menjalani rawatan di Jakarta.

programme.title: Cinta 2 Pilihan Ep111
programme.desc: Fathir dan Sukma merupakan pasangan suami isteri yang hidup bahagia dalam kesederhanaan di Magelang. Mereka mempunyai seorang anak perempuan bernama Zahra. programme.title: Jejak Cahaya Islam Banjarmasin Ep8
programme.desc: Jejak sejarah Islam yang mendalam melalui keindahan alam semula jadi yang menakjubkan dan masjid-masjid megah di Banjarmasin dalam dokumentari yang menarik.

programme.title: Jejak Cahaya Islam Banjarmasin Ep9
programme.desc: Jejak sejarah Islam yang mendalam melalui keindahan alam semula jadi yang menakjubkan dan masjid-masjid megah di Banjarmasin dalam dokumentari yang menarik.

programme.title: AKSI Indonesia Ep30
programme.desc: 24 Ustaz dan Ustazah dari pelbagai wilayah di Indonesia mengambil langkah untuk menang dengan melibatkan diri dalam pelbagai aktiviti Islamik yang menghiburkan dan bermakna. Saksikan dakwah mereka beraksi bersama para pengulas.

programme.title: Di Antara Dua Cinta Ep58
programme.desc: Pada hari ulang tahun perkahwinan Shafira dan Rafael yang ke-2, Shafira dikejutkan dengan berita bahawa Rafael telah terlibat dalam satu kemalangan, dan jasadnya tidak ditemui. Beberapa tahun berlalu, Rafael akhirnya disahkan meninggal dunia. Shafira kemudian membuat keputusan untuk berkahwin semula dengan Julian. Namun, di puncak kebahagiaan perkahwinan mereka, Rafael tiba-tiba muncul kembali.

programme.title: Cinta Setelah Cinta S2 Ep70
programme.desc: Starla menyangka dia telah menghadapi segalanya, tetapi penipuan Niko jauh lebih mendalam daripada yang disangkanya. Ketika dia terus berusaha mempertahankan perkahwinannya, ancaman baharu muncul. Ayu, yang masih taksub dengan Niko, semakin mengikatnya dalam perangkap dengan menggunakan anak mereka yang belum lahir sebagai umpan. Pada masa yang sama, naluri Starla merasakan ada sesuatu yang tidak kena, dan dia mula diburu oleh bayang-bayang serta rahsia gelap. Dengan keluarganya di ambang bahaya dan emosinya semakin tertekan, adakah Starla mampu melindungi orang-orang tersayang? Atau adakah pengkhianatan Niko akan mendorongnya melangkaui batas yang tidakbolehkembali?

programme.title: Jatim Traveler Ep13
programme.desc: Jatim Traveler membawa anda mengembara menerokai keunikan kulinari, keindahan destinasi pelancongan, dan tradisi istimewa di serata pelosok Jawa Timur.

programme.title: Bumbu Cinta Diracik Oleh Rasa Yang Ada
programme.desc: Resipi bandrek Ratna sangat istimewa, dipenuhi dengan cinta, menghasilkan rasa yang sangat lazat dan memiliki ramai pelanggan, dengan perasa kayu manis, semanis wajahnya. Suatu hari, Ratna kehilangan gerobak bersama bandreknya, dan dia mengejar pencuri itu lalu memukulnya. Namun, ternyata lelaki itu bukan pencuri, tetapi lelaki yang sedang mencari bahan untuk tesisnya. Apa yang akan terjadi seterusnya?

programme.desc: Laras adalah seorang petani yang setiap hari sibuk menguruskan lada-lada pedas. Tidak hairanlah, kerana keluarganya memang berkecimpung dalam bidang pertanian lada, dan Laras yang dibesarkan di sana sangat gemar makanan pedas. Tiba-tiba, hidupnya yang biasa-biasa sahaja berubah apabila seorang lelaki kacak bernama Ryan muncul. Yang peliknya, Ryan tidak suka makanan pedas sama sekali, tetapi dia berkeras mengatakan bahawa dia sangat mencintai Laras.

programme.title: Papa
programme.desc: A Korean talent agent arrives in America and goes through with a fake marriage to stay there. However, his fake wife later dies in a car accident, leaving him with her six children.

programme.title: Waiting For Rain
programme.desc: An unmotivated student regains his passion for life after exchanging letters with his childhood friend and promise to meet if it rains on December 31st each year.

programme.title: Following
programme.desc: Real estate agent Jung-Tae has a penchant for spying. He discovers the death of the social media star So-Ra. He is falsely accused of murder and is determined to find the real culprit.

programme.title: One Win
programme.desc: Woo-jin is the newly appointed manager of a girls' volleyball team which is going to disband. The new owner sold all ace players for money and asked the team to win at least once.

programme.title: The Chronicles Of Evil
programme.desc: A detective must untangle past mistakes to figure out why he was targeted at the first place and becomes the murderer of a taxi driver.

programme.desc: N. Korea detective returns for another secret mission. Despite having different underlying motives, 3 countries join forces to bring down an international crime organization.

programme.title: Missing You
programme.desc: When Hee-Joo was 7 years old, her father was murdered. The killer, Ki-Bum, was eventually arrested. Hee-Joo has waited patiently for Ki-Bum's release.

programme.desc: The ambassadors from North and South Korea in Somalia must join hands to escape from war-torn Somalia.

programme.title: Fabricated City
programme.desc: When an online gamer is framed for a murder, a hacker tries to uncover the truth behind the murder case and help clear his name.

programme.title: Set Me Free

programme.title: Dear Mom (M) Ep56
programme.desc: Feng-Yi Li handles everything in the house while her husband, Shu-An, lounges and daydreams. She constantly worries about the love lives of their four daughters. Yi-Wan starts a relationship with a gang leaders son despite claiming to have never dated. Qing-Qing may be having an affair with a married man. Xiao-Xi is infatuated with the school team captain but is unaware of "the others." An-Qing returns from the US with her son after a failed marriage. When Feng-Yi suddenly disappears, the sisters realize they've neglected their mother, who has always supported them. Now they must find her and get their lives back on track.

programme.desc: Wu is a senior police officer has always wanted a son to carry his family name and join the force. However, he and wife are bequeathed with four daughters! In this charming drama, Wu & his wife become their daughters greatest haven, through the ups and downs they face as married women.

programme.title: Just Eat (M) Ep24
programme.desc: In the new culinary show Just Eat, celebrities reveal their favorite chefs and memorable dishes. This series explores how these culinary experiences have impacted their lives, from overcoming personal struggles to finding new career paths. Join us to discover the flavors and stories that resonate with these well-known personalities.

programme.title: Hot Door Night (M) Ep2320
programme.desc: Different in age, generation, and hosting style, these three hosts not only can sing, act, dance, and imitate, but are also skilled in cross-talk! With this unique combination, we hope to attract viewers of all ages and spark great entertainment.

programme.title: The Sound of Happiness (T) Ep16
programme.desc: Wu is a senior police officer has always wanted a son to carry his family name and join the force. However, he and wife are bequeathed with four daughters! As a doting father, his chief objective is to help them find happiness in their marriages. In this charming drama, Wu & his wife become their daughters greatest haven, through the ups and downs they face as married women.

programme.title: The Tradition Story of Taiwan (T) Ep5078
programme.desc: The Tradition Story of Taiwan presents a series of tales and folktales in Taiwan that have been pass down from one generation to another generation.

programme.title: The White Storm
programme.desc: Three Narcotics Bureau officers who are good friends get involved in a case with the drug lord. When the operation fails, they must make a devastating decision - two can live, but one must die. Five years later, the two vow to take revenge but end up competing against each other for their own lives. Will brotherhood be sacrificed again?

programme.title: A Guilty Conscience
programme.desc: Due to the negligence of sharp-tongued barrister Adrian, his innocent client is convicted of murder and sentenced to 17 years in jail. An opportunity to appeal the case and free his client arises a few years later, but in order to right his wrong, he must fight against one of the most powerful families in Hong Kong for justice to prevail.

programme.title: Born to Fly
programme.desc: Lei Yu has officially become the new generation of Chinese test pilots after rounds of strict selection. Captain Zhang Ting leads Lei Yu and other pilots to test the latest fighter jets. Lei Yu keeps pushing the limits in each test flight in the hope of coming up with the perfect plane to ensure the safety of the fighter pilots.

programme.title: Everything Under Control
programme.desc: During a diamond heist, one of the security escorts, Jelly, steals the diamonds and flees. Fellow security escorts, Yau Shing and Penguin, are forced to help the robber track down the diamonds. They stumble onto a remote village along the way, encountering strange villagers and mysterious incidents. Can they finally locate Jelly and the diamonds?

programme.title: Kung Fu Hustle
programme.desc: Mobster Sing aspires to join the Axe Gang. As he stumbles into a slum ruled by eccentric landlords that are kung fu masters in disguise, his actions cause the gang and the landlords to engage in an explosive kung fu battle

programme.title: Limbo
programme.desc: Hong Kong is rocked by a series of brutal murders committed by a serial killer. Veteran detective Zhan and rookie cop Will are assigned to the case. During the investigation, they encounter Wang Tao, who accidentally killed Zhan's wife. Seeking redemption, Wang assists them in tracking down the killer, but her involvement puts her in grave danger.

programme.title: New Kung Fu Cult Master 2
programme.desc: In this sequel, Zhang Wu Ji successfully rescued the Six Major sects at Dadu. Nevertheless, the quest for the Dragon Sabre continues as Wu Ji and his three girlfriends set sail for Ice Fire Island. After a series of vicious fights, they finally unveil the secret behind the Heaven Sword and Dragon Sabre.

programme.title: Dragon Tiger Gate
programme.desc: Adapted from a famous Hong Kong comic, Tiger Wong is ambushed after he unwittingly took the Lousha Plaque but is saved by his brother Dragon Wong. They also befriended Turbo Shek during the fight and the trio forms a brotherhood. To avenge the death of the Dragon Gate masters, they train and vow to defeat Shibumi, the leader of Lousha Clan.

programme.title: Mr. & Mrs. Player
programme.desc: Chinese Feng Shui master, Carson (Chapman To) was a "Natural Born Player", taking names and breaking hearts. Fate had it that he would meet his match, the hot veterinarian, Chi-Ling (Chrissie Chau). It was love at first sight but neither could stand the other's fickle nature lest the affair might have ended as soon as it began.

programme.title: Better Days
programme.desc: In this Oscar nominee for Best International Feature Film, Nian faces relentless bullying from her peers as she prepares for her college entrance exam. Fate leads her to streetwise punk Bei, but before they can retreat into their own world, both are embroiled in a murder investigation that will change their lives forever.

programme.title: The Italian Recipe
programme.desc: Famous pop idol Peng travels to Rome for a reality show and encounters an ordinary girl, Mang, who dreams of becoming a great chef after migrating to Italy. Peng and Mang have nothing in common but spend a magical night in Rome together. Their lives begin to change as the two start to fall in love.

programme.title: Chasing the Dragon
programme.desc: Infamous real-life drug kingpin Crippled Ho came to Hong Kong as an illegal immigrant in 1963 and ruthlessly built an empire from the chaotic underworld of drug dealers and corrupt police who ruled the city under notorious detective Lee Rock.

programme.title: Kung Fu Hustle
programme.desc: Mobster Sing aspires to join the Axe Gang. As he stumbles into a slum ruled by eccentric landlords that are kung fu masters in disguise, his actions cause the gang and the landlords to engage in an explosive kung fu battle

programme.title: Endless Battle
programme.desc: This is a story about two brothers. The younger brother is a drug lord while the elder brother Zhong is a police officer in the Narcotics Bureau. Both are involved in a drug cartels turf battle and during an escort mission, Zhong discovers his brothers hidden identity. This leads to an endless battle between good and evil.

programme.title: Vanguard
programme.desc: A businessman Qin Guo Li is being kidnapped in London and his daughter is also in danger. The international security team, Vanguard, is hired to rescue them. Tang Huan Ting, the founder, gathers an elite team to track them down across countries, from London to Africa and Dubai. In the process, they also discover another dangerous conspiracy.

programme.title: Rob N Roll
programme.desc: A ruthless bandit, Tian, has plotted an intense and quick armed robbery. When he encounters Hui and Shui who also plan for a robbery, they decide to team up for the heist. However, their ad-hoc and dramatic robbery has started a war with the police hot on pursuit, putting their lives on the line!

programme.title: The Wandering Earth II
programme.desc: In this prequel, humans build enormous engines on the Earths surface to find a new home when the sun is burning out. In the dangerous universe, a group of young people has to step forward once again to fight in the critical battle to save the Earth.

programme.title: Bursting Point
programme.desc: Senior Inspector Bang sends Officer Ming undercover to a drug cartel to displace drug lord Yang. A failed raid triggers Yang's rage for revenge. Meanwhile, drug maker Ying Xiu is forced to cooperate with the police and sets a trap for Yang. The battle between the police and the drug cartel has just begun!

programme.title: Shock Wave 2
programme.desc: A series of bomb explosions is causing fear in Hong Kong. Former bomb specialist Feng is found in coma at the crime scene and becomes a suspect. To prove his innocence, he seeks help from his former partner Wen. However, it seems revealing the truth is as risky as disposing a bomb

programme.title: Last Suspect
programme.desc: Lawyer Chen receives a mysterious call demanding her to defend a murder suspect after her daughter is kidnapped, and is told that she can only save her daughter by winning the case. As she starts investigation with the police and evidence emerges, Chen discovers the truth and reveals the mastermind. Can she rescue her daughter in time?

programme.title: Lion Rock
programme.desc: Based on the true story of David Ki, one of Asias top rock climbers who lost everything when a motorcycle accident crippled him. Rather than succumbing to his fate, David found a way of scaling the dizzying peaks again by becoming a wheelchair-bound athlete and soon reached the peak of Lion Rock!

programme.title: Happy Dragons
programme.desc: Four retired secret agents embark on a quest for the "Golden Relic" triggered by a mahjong game. Their journey unexpectedly transports them back 30 years, restoring their youth. While striving to rectify their past mistakes, the agents unravel a hidden conspiracy along the way.

programme.title: Golden Chickensss
programme.desc: Ah Kam is now a mama-san leading a team of young prostitutes to service the rich and famous, and she always aims to fulfil every clients needs. When Ah Kams ex-lover, a triad boss, encounters difficulties adapting to a new Hong Kong after his release from a long imprisonment, she helps him get back on his feet to lead a normal life.

programme.title: Ride On
programme.desc: Master Luo, a washed-up stuntman, trains his beloved horse Red Hare to be a stunt horse. Due to his debts though, Red Hare may be taken away by the debtors. Master Luo has no choice but to seek help from his estranged daughter, and the incident ends up becoming a golden opportunity for them to reconcile.

programme.title: Bodyguards and Assassins
programme.desc: On 15 October 1906, Chinese revolutionary leader Sun Yat Sen returned to Hong Kong to stage another overthrow of the Qing dynasty. Businessman Lee and Chinese Dailys Chief Chan arrange for five bodyguards to protect Mr Sun - these are all extraordinary fighters who are ready and up for fierce battles against the Qing assassination army.

programme.title: Dust to Dust
programme.desc: Back in 1995, the Police successfully arrested five armed bank robbers while the two masterminds got tipped off and made a clean escape. Decades later, retired cop Wang Shou Yue is drawn back to the unsolved case when he sees a blurred figure in a news clip. A battle between good and evil has just begun!

programme.title: New Kung Fu Cult Master 1
programme.desc: Wu Dang Sects Zhang Chui Shans son, Zhang Wu Ji, finds himself accidentally embroiled in the fight for the Dragon Sabre. When he unwittingly learns the powerful martial arts skills from the Jiuyin scriptures, Wu Ji proceeds to help the Six Major sects fight against the corrupt government.

programme.title: The Way We Dance
programme.desc: Tofu shop girl Fleur possesses a quirky gift for hip hop and dance which she uses to becomes a supernova in the university dance crew. Meanwhile, Alan, from the Tai Chi Club has an eye for Fleur's sleight of hand and tries to recruit her into his club.

programme.title: The Mermaid
programme.desc: A real estate tycoon plans to turn a marine protected area into a new property development, thereby destroying the secret habitat of the mermaids. A beautiful mermaid, Shan, is tasked to seduce the tycoon and stop the destruction. However, when Shans mission fails, a final, fatal war between humans and mermaids becomes inevitable.

programme.title: New Police Story
programme.desc: Senior Inspector Wing is an elite in the police force but has been drowning his guilt in booze after his entire team was killed by the Gang of Five in a mission. A year later, a young rookie detective with a complicated background is assigned to partner Wing and manages to inspire him into action, as Wing vows to take down the gang.

programme.title: Return To The 36Th Chamber
programme.desc: The second film of the trilogy, Gordon Liu plays Zhou Ren Jie, a man who impersonates a monk in order to learn kung fu in Shaolin, and eventually creates his own Shaolin style of scaffolding kung fu.

programme.title: We Love Millionaires
programme.desc: In this romantic comedy, three beautiful Hong Kong salesgirls travel to Osaka in Japan to pursue their dreams of marrying a rich man. They masquerade as high society debutantes and make their way to a posh resort to meet and woo millionaires (or fake ones!).

programme.title: Secret Service Of The Imperial Court
programme.desc: Zhao Bu Fan is the sergeant of the governments secret police. Wang is a cruel and ruthless eunuch who takes over the Emperors ruling power and leads the team of secret agents. After witnessing the atrocities committed by Eunuch Wang, Sergeant Zhao decides to defect but ends up being hunted by his friends, comrades and even his father.

programme.title: The Dream Of The Red Chamber
programme.desc: Adapted from the great Chinese classic novel of the same name, the son of renowned Jia family, Bao Yu, is deeply in love with his cousin, Dai Yu. However, his mother disapproves of their relationship and plots to arrange Bao Yu to marry another rich girl, resulting in a tragic ending for the perfect couple.

programme.title: The Twelve Gold Medallions
programme.desc: This was one of top three films of 1970 and winner of "Outstanding Drama" at the 9th Golden Horse Awards. The evil minister uses twelve golden medallions to summon war hero Yueh Fei back from the frontline and execute him. A group of wandering warriors, led by Yueh Hua and Chin Ping, try to stop the medallion couriers.

programme.title: The Mermaid
programme.desc: Zhang and Jins daughter, Peony, are betrothed at birth but Jin objects to the engagement now. Zhang meets a carp spirit that looks exactly like Peony and they fall in love. When Justice Bao is asked by Jin to distinguish Peony from her replica, he decides to quit the case when he witness the true love between Zhang and the carp spirit.

programme.title: Swift Sword
programme.desc: A righteous swordsman, Bai Yi Pang, seeks revenge on an evil clan but is crippled after being beaten up by them. Years later, a young man encounters Bai who is hiding in a cave. Bai decides to teach this determined young man his Swift Sword skills so that he can help Bai take revenge on the evil clan.

programme.title: Princess Iron Fan
programme.desc: As Monkey and his gang make their way to the West through Fire Mountain, they ran into the evil Princess Iron Fan, Madam White Bone and her sexy sister, and have to fight their way through.

programme.title: The Black Enforcer
programme.desc: Lung the Black Enforcer is ordered to escort a murderer Fei to prison. While taking shelter in Lungs house from the snowstorm, Fei is rescued by his gang and Fei kills Lungs mother and sister before escaping. Lung is imprisoned for the failed task and after being released, he vows to avenge his family by killing Fei.

programme.title: The Magnificent Concubine
programme.desc: Yang Gui Fei is the beloved concubine of Emperor Tang Ming Huang, who is so besotted with her that he leaves the running of the country to Prime Minister Yang Guo Zhong, the brother of Yang Gui Fei. The Prime Minister is corrupt and cruel to the army, causing them to revolt and endanger the throne. Yang Gui Fei is also implicated and kills herself.

programme.title: Empress Wu
programme.desc: Wu Ze Tian is a beautiful and talented concubine of Emperor Tang at age 14. She becomes a nun after he died but has two sons with the new Emperor Tang Gao Zong. The Empress asks Wu to team up with her against Consort Xiao, but is set up and dethroned by Wu, who also kills her two sons. After the Emperors death, Wu becomes the first woman Emperor.

programme.title: The Water Margin
programme.desc: This is a martial arts epic directed by Chang Cheh. In the Sung Dynasty, the government is run by corrupt officials, so Sung Jiang gathers 108 outlaws at Mount Liang and establishes a band of patriotic heroes to end the repression of brutal overlords.

programme.title: My Name Ain'T Suzie
programme.desc: Young Mei Li works as a bar girl in Wanchai to make a living. When she meets Jimmy in the bar, she thinks he is her true love and falls crazily in love with him. When Jimmy has to leave, Mei Li is devastated. It is not until she encounters the triad boss Ying that she finally found someone to count on.

programme.title: The Bloody Escape
programme.desc: Ku is a skilled Kung Fu artist brought up by the bandits and does not agree with the brutal leader of the bandits camp. He rescues Tong, a young lady forced to become the leaders wife, causing both the authorities and bandits to come after them. Ku has to stand up against the bandits that he grew up with so as to start a new life for himself.

programme.title: Heroes Of The East
programme.desc: A Chinese man marries a Japanese woman through an arranged marriage and manages to insult all of her Japanese martial arts family by issuing a challenge to her that is misinterpreted by the others. He must then prove how good Chinese Kung Fu really is through a series of duels with the seven Japanese martial artists who come to meet the challenge!

programme.title: The Deadly Knives
programme.desc: Martial arts student Yen returns from school to defend his family homestead against Japanese financiers after his father is killed. On the way, he meets Hua and falls in love with her. However, Hua discovers that her father is plotting with the Japanese to take Yens property and wants to murder him. It is a tough choice between family and love

programme.title: The Amorous Lotus Pan
programme.desc: Adapted from the renowned Chinese novel, The Water Margin, this is the story of a poor and beautiful girl Lotus Pan, who is raped by her master and had to be married off to a midget who treats her badly. Lost and lonely, Pan unwittingly becomes a pawn in the game of lust between her husbands playboy brother Wu Song, and a murderous man Men Ching.

programme.title: Heaven Sword And Dragon Sabre 2
programme.desc: Only by bringing together the powerful Heaven Sword and the mighty Dragon Sabre can six martial arts sects struggling for supremacy be saved in this thrilling sequel to Chu Yuan's original hit.

programme.title: Return Of The Crazy Bumpkins
programme.desc: This sequel makes for more bittersweet laughs and heart-wrenching misfortune, as Ah Niu gets out of the jail to find his true love becoming the wife of an abusive husband, and his uncle further exploits his naive nature.

programme.title: The Kung-Fu Instructor
programme.desc: Wong Yang is a famous martial artist who is forced to teach kung fu to the Mong Clan, an evil clan which is trying to destroy its nemesis, the Chow Clan. Chow Ping from the Chow Clan is a student of Wongs caught in the Mongs territory and as punishment, the Mong Clan wants to cut off Chow Pings limbs. Wong steps in to defend his student.

programme.title: The Flying Guillotine
programme.desc: Ma Teng is an assassin of the Flying Guillotine Squad, a group of killers commissioned by the Emperor Yung. When Ma starts to question the morality of his missions, he finds himself becoming a fugitive hunted by his former comrades.

programme.title: That Fiery Girl
programme.desc: The bandits of Hulu Valley slay the chief of the Mei Clan while searching for a treasure map. In retaliation, Chun from the Mei Clan infiltrates the bandit's fortress to map a way in for the authorities, but ends up falling in love with the bandit leader's daughter, Pearl. While Chuns plot is uncovered, he receives unexpected help from Pearl.

programme.title: The Crimson Palm
programme.desc: Poor student Lin is engaged to the daughter of a rich man who despises him because of his familys declining status. Lin visits his fiance before leaving for the Imperial examination, but finds a maid lying dead in blood. As Lins bloody handprint is left on the site, he is accused of the murder. How can Justice Bao prove his innocence?

programme.title: The Villains
programme.desc: Hung is an orphan seeking help from her wealthy uncle who has two sons but only dotes on the younger son Feng, a playboy. Feng covets the beauty of Hung and rapes her but when she gets pregnant, Hung is wrongfully accused and gets sent off by her uncle to protect Feng. Will Feng be punished for his villainy?

programme.title: Iron Bodyguard
programme.desc: Wang Wu, the head of a security firm Iron Bodyguard, meets a scholar who is a member of the Reformists, a group of scholars pressing for social reform in China at the end of the Qing dynasty. The Emperor actually supports such reforms but not the Empress Dowager. She orders the Reformists to be arrested and Wang Wu gets drawn into the politics.

programme.title: The Lizard
programme.desc: A seasoned burglar 'The Lizard' sets himself up against a corrupt police chief and announced that he will steal a diamond from a rich mans party. His real identity, which is discovered by the corrupt police chiefs granddaughter, is actually a young policeman who is doing it all for justice.

programme.title: Crazy Nuts Of Kung Fu
programme.desc: A roadside bandit and a traveling gambler team up to make money from gambling. In a successful attempt to steal a huge amount of money from a warlords home, they encounter revolutionists who seek their help to fund the reform campaign. Will the two help the revolutionists cause with the stolen money?

programme.title: Mist Over Dream Lake
programme.desc: A young girl Chen is sent away by her parents who are going through divorce, to stay with the Changs. On the Changs farm, she meets their two sons, the youngest daughter and a young artist, and spends a summer with them that she will never forget.

programme.title: The Assassin
programme.desc: Notorious assassin Nieh Cheng has retired into hiding. However, when Premier Yen's family is massacred, he seeks out the reclusive swordsman and coaxes him into a final revenge mission in this epic story set in the Six Kingdom era.

programme.title: The Adventures of Emperor Chien Lung
programme.desc: Emperor Chien Lung travels incognito to Jiangnan to review his peoples livelihood but soon discovers that corrupt officials are oppressing his people. The emperor meets an upright young man and they join hands to teach the corrupt officials a lesson. The young man was appointed as his bodyguard thereafter.

programme.title: Shaolin Rescuers
programme.desc: Hong Xi Guan of Shaolin is chased and wounded by a martial arts scum who took refuge in the Qing court. He is saved and healed by friends from the wet market and they hide Hong in a bean curd shop to protect him. However, Hongs enemy finds him and ambushes him at the shop, hoping to capture Hong and all his friends.

programme.title: Carry on Doctors and Nurses
programme.desc: At St. Morant Hospital, a harried but lovely administrator must deal with lusty interns, student nurses, a delirious surgeon, a dissection fiend, a criticizing Commissioner and gross negligence at regular intervals! This comedy is based on the hugely successful British Carry On! film series.

programme.title: Lady With A Sword
programme.desc: Swordswoman Feng tries to find a group of villains responsible for her eldest sister's death, but is shocked to discover that her fianc, Jin, is one of them. At the same time, Jin's mother and the two other killers are planning to kill Feng. Can Feng fight back and take her revenge?

programme.title: Fangs of the Cobra
programme.desc: Incredibly, the title serpent is not a harbinger of horror, but actually the film's hero. This virtuous viper sniffs out bombs, fights gangs, battles a baby-killing rodent and even takes on a duplicitous woman. This one-of-a-kind thriller will be applauded by reptile fans everywhere.

programme.title: The 36th Chamber of Shaolin
programme.desc: Gordon Liu plays an anti-Manchu rebel who escapes to the Shaolin Temple and learns what it truly takes to become a martial arts master by challenging the 35 Shaolin Kung Fu chambers, eventually creating the 36th chamber himself.

Featuring seven dynamic teamsTaipei Mars, New Taipei Kings, New Taipei CTBC DEA, Taoyuan Taiwan Beer Leopards, Hsinchu Toplus Lioneers, Formosa Dreamers, and Kaohsiung AquasTPBL showcases high-intensity competition and unforgettable moments on the court. With a commitment to excellence, innovation, and fan engagement, TPBL is shaping the future of professional basketball in Asia and inspiring the next generation of athletes.

programme.desc: Simon Reeve travels through the remote and little-visited north east of South America, from Venezuela to French Guiana.

programme.title: Chasing Monsters S3 Ep1
programme.desc: High Voltage Killer - After meeting several electric eel attack victims and hearing stories of people who lost their lives, Cyril is determined to catch the biggest one possible and measure its voltage. The only problem is how to avoid being electrocuted in the process.

programme.title: Croc Watch with Steve Backshall S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Steve tries to find out if monster crocodiles can still thrive in the Reserve, and encounters five-metre-long Henry. But will he finally find the monster croc he's been searching for?

programme.title: Michael Portillo's Long Weekends S1 Ep4
programme.desc: Sicily, Part 1 - Michael dives into local life by tackling the island's murderous links to the Mafia, visiting a bizarre villa of monsters and soaking up the lavish surroundings at the most exquisite of hotels.

programme.title: Inside the Factory S9 Ep1
programme.desc: Chocolate Seashells - Paddy McGuinness visits a factory that makes 4 million individual Belgian chocolates every day. Ruth discovers the origin of St Nicholas and later visits a chocolate museum.

programme.title: Ocean Parks S1 Ep5
programme.desc: Bahamas Exuma Cays - The Exuma Cays are a remote wonder: hundreds of tiny islands extending south from the Bahamian Capital of Nassau. In the 1950s, developers dreamed of developing this pristine, and largely unexplored region. But before construction could begin, the Bahamian government supported an expedition to chart the cays. They liked what they saw, and in 1959 established the Bahamas National Trust, creating the Bahamas first Ocean Park.

programme.title: Wildlife Icons S2 Ep3
programme.desc: Elephant Story - Once superabundant, African Elephant populations have declined drastically due to hunting. Get an in-depth look into the lives of the most powerful land mammals on the planet, and see what parks like Addo and Tembe are doing to preserve their future.

programme.title: Wildlife Icons S2 Ep4
programme.desc: Killer Packs - Surviving the African savanna requires guile and teamwork for species who live in packs. Follow a day in the life of African wild dogs and dwarf mongooses to see how they rely on their tight-knit families to overcome the challenging landscape.

programme.title: Wildlife Icons S2 Ep5
programme.desc: Living Together - A complex web of relationships rules all life on earth: all species are interconnected, none can survive in isolation. While some relationships are one-sided, others are mutually beneficial. From loose associations to tight-knit partnerships, everything has a place in natures great scheme. Complex interactions between species are not even limited to animals, and some of the best examples occur in the lush mountain forests of Africa.

programme.title: Wildlife Icons S2 Ep6
programme.desc: Crocs and Hippos of Ndumo - The Nile crocodile and hippopotamus are two of Africas amphibious freshwater icons, found in waterways, rivers and lakes across the continent, including the stunning wilderness of Kwa-Zulu Natal in South Africa. These two species have co-existed for thousands of years, evolving in different ways to a life aquatic.

programme.title: Rewilding S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Return of the European Bison - Travel to western Germany, where Europes largest mammals have returned to the landscape after being hunted to extinction in the early 20th century. Discover the challenges animals and humans face from the beasts reintroduction to the wild.

programme.title: Cub Camp S1 Ep1
programme.desc: The Littlest Cub - Get to know Winston, a tiny abandoned cub who imprints on Judy as she nurses him 24-7. Feel the heartbreak as she severs their emotional attachment and teaches this sweet little fellow how to be a grown-up, independent bear in the non-human world.

programme.title: Cub Camp S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Meet the X-Girls - Welcome sisters Xiba, Xyla, and Xola, a trio of starving orphans who turn Winstons world upside down before gentle Xola teaches him a lesson about friendship. Then monitor new cubs Yasmine and Yara, who get reacquainted after a stressful separation.

programme.title: Cub Camp S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Becoming a Bear - Bone up on outdoor skills as Winston and the X girls move into their new fresh-air enclosure, and witness Yasmine and Yaras kindergarten power struggle. Then look over restless yearling Victor, whose sudden limp pushes back his release date.

programme.title: Cub Camp S1 Ep4
programme.desc: Victor Goes Wild - Experience the joys of rain and climbing with Yasmine and Yara, and watch Winston take a dip in his new pool. Go hunting for dropped radio collars with Roger and Steve, then see what happens when the two groups of summer cubs come face-to-face.

programme.title: The Hungry Games: Alaska's Big Bear Challenge S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Welcome to the Tundra - Wake up post-hibernation with 7 ravenous bears as Stage 1 of the competition kicks off. Battle wolves with new mom BoldFace, see tiny Stomper vie for power and Blondies love, and stand back as grizzled vet Bernie brawls with clueless teen Casanova.

programme.title: The Hungry Games: Alaska's Big Bear Challenge S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Slammin' Salmon - Join the frantic dash to cash in on Julys salmon run with the Stage 1 winners and some tough new recruits. Tag along on BigBoi's food-finding road trip, welcome QuadMom and RedBack to the feast, and see if BoldFace can keep her surviving cub safe.

programme.title: The Hungry Games: Alaska's Big Bear Challenge S1 Ep3
programme.desc: So Long and Thanks for All the Fish - Bundle up as an icy October storm complicates the race to the finish line. See Big Boi bounce after a stumble before tragedy hits QuadMom, and cheer as fan fave BoldFace hits her stride despite her clingy kid, Raccoon. But who will wear the crown?

programme.title: Cub Camp S1 Ep1
programme.desc: The Littlest Cub - Get to know Winston, a tiny abandoned cub who imprints on Judy as she nurses him 24-7. Feel the heartbreak as she severs their emotional attachment and teaches this sweet little fellow how to be a grown-up, independent bear in the non-human world.

programme.title: Wild Dogs: Pack vs. Pride S2 Ep4
programme.desc: Kakumbi Are Vulnerable - Encounter an elephant as Julz and Henry from the ZCP track the Kakumbi pups, who face off with a stubborn, razor-tusked warthog. Follow Thandie Mweetwa, ZCPs lion specialist, who counts the prides that are pushing the Manzi out of their territory.

programme.title: Chasing the Rains S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Praying for Rain - Trail Anastasia as her herd splits to protect two precious elephant calves, while Kuleta retakes territory for her remaining cheetah cubs. Join wild dog Phoenixs search for a new mate as the skies open up and rain begins to heal the parched land.

programme.title: Chasing the Rains S1 Ep4
programme.desc: The Inside Story - Look behind the scenes and meet the innovative teams working to preserve and protect Kenyas wildlife. Check out Save the Elephants radio-tracking-collar system, a drone that monitors wild dog packs, and a local team of Maasai cheetah trackers.

programme.title: Africa's Hunters S3 Ep2
programme.desc: Prides and Prejudice - As the lionesses set out to recover the males who are needed to hunt buffalo, they must cross a crocodile-infested river. Follow Milo, the only cub in the mighty Mwamba pride, as hes saved from snapping jaws and cements the familys future.

programme.title: Boss Shark
programme.desc: Witness the ultimate battle for dominance as scientists try to pick out the alpha male in a pack of 100-plus great white sharks off the New Zealand coast. Marvel at the speed, hunting prowess, and fearlessness that determine the leader of the pack.

programme.title: Osprey: Sea Raptor
programme.desc: Wade into a saltwater marsh along the Connecticut River to witness the heartwarming reunion of two ospreys whove been mates for a decade. Witness their highs and lows over a single summer as they raise their chicks and dodge a host of predators.

programme.title: Extreme Africa S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Dragon Mountain: Surviving the Summit - South Africa's Drakensberg is one of the continent's most impressive landscapes. It is home to sharp climatic and ecological gradients as physical conditions change for both land-based creatures and the Raptors that swirl in the skies above.

programme.title: Rewilding S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Hidden Gem of the North - Explore a biodiversity hotspot in the heart of northern Germany, where biologists engineered the return of tree frogs, mink, Ferruginous ducks, and osprey. Discover how the area may become a paradise for many rare animals once considered extinct.

programme.title: Wild Dogs: Pack vs. Pride S2 Ep5
programme.desc: Tragedy Strikes Kakumbi - Feel your heart race when the Kakumbi tree a leopard whos been stalking them. Join Julz on a ZCP lion-collaring mission, go fishing with scout Simon, explore mealtime pack hierarchy, and witness a heartbreaking vigil for a badly injured Kakumbi pup.

programme.title: Boss Shark
programme.desc: Witness the ultimate battle for dominance as scientists try to pick out the alpha male in a pack of 100-plus great white sharks off the New Zealand coast. Marvel at the speed, hunting prowess, and fearlessness that determine the leader of the pack.

programme.title: Africa's Hunters S3 Ep3
programme.desc: The Misfit Comes of Age - If the tiny Nsefu pride is to survive, the teen Misfit and his older brother must quickly perfect their hunting skills. Trek into enemy territory as the lions face dominant rivals and a powerful hyena clan in the search for prey.

programme.title: Africa's Wild Horizons S2 Ep3
programme.desc: The Last Desert Giants - The Namib is the oldest desert in the world, hugging Africas shoreline for over 400 kilometers. It is one of the most inhospitable habitats on earth. Yet the worlds largest land mammal has made a home here, adapted through behavior and designed to life in the extreme.

programme.title: Africa's Wild Horizons S2 Ep4
programme.desc: Crowded Islands - On rocky islands off the coast of South Africa, thousands of creatures congregate to breed. Among these, huge colonies of cape gannets dominate. Surrounded by rich waters, they can find enough to feed themselves and their young. But life is full of challenges for the breeding gannets...

programme.title: Extreme Africa S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Lake Manyara National Park - In north Tanzania, towering mountains line a dramatic valley. Enriched by ancient volcanoes, its slopes provide a variety of habitats for life to thrive and its great centerpiece holds water through even the driest of times.

programme.title: Rewilding S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Andalucia's Struggle - Investigate the animals that have been returned to this mosaic of extreme habitats in Spain. Then discover how small environmental changes can make big differences in the populations of many endangered species and give them a real chance to recover.

programme.title: Carpathian Predators S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Realm of the Bear - Join a mother brown bear as she struggles to find food for her two young cubs while teaching them essential skills for the harsh winter ahead. Then visit a pair of tiny lynx kittens as they begin to venture away from the safety of their den.

programme.title: Africa's Hunters S3 Ep3
programme.desc: The Misfit Comes of Age - If the tiny Nsefu pride is to survive, the teen Misfit and his older brother must quickly perfect their hunting skills. Trek into enemy territory as the lions face dominant rivals and a powerful hyena clan in the search for prey.

Surrounded by rich waters, they can find enough to feed themselves and their young. But life is full of challenges for the breeding gannets...

programme.title: Donal Skehan: Home Cook S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Donal Skehan shows us how to make midweek comfort food, including a mushroom gnocchi, prawn pasta and an air-fryer tofu ramen.

programme.title: Jason Atherton's Dubai Dishes S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Spices - Jason's debut in Dubai is all things spice as he explores a traditional souk in the old town, shows us how to spice up our lives, and is joined by local chef Rahul Rana.

programme.title: Jason Atherton's Dubai Dishes S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Breakfast and Brunch - Jason invites us over for breakfast this time - he cooks a Spanish dish inspired by a full English.

programme.title: Jason Atherton's Dubai Dishes S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Vegetables - Jason shares his love of fresh produce with a trip to a supersized Dubai vegetable market as he makes dishes that include a tomato tartare with black olive tapenade and a pudding made with beetroot and carrot. He is joined by Chef Mohamed Orfali, who visits a farm just outside Dubai that grows vegetables in desert sand.

programme.title: Jason Atherton's Dubai Dishes S1 Ep4
programme.desc: Fish - Award winning chef Jason Atherton continues his journey through Dubai at the beach, where he cooks up some delicious fish and seafood recipes inspired by this beautiful coastal city. He is joined by Chef Akmal Anuar, who heads into the Persian Gulf on a deep-sea fishing trip to catch fresh barracuda for his incredible woodfired recipe.

programme.title: Jason Atherton's Dubai Dishes S1 Ep5
programme.desc: Fruit - Michelin starred chef Jason uses beautiful produce from the Middle East to create delicious dishes that have fruit as the hero ingredientfigs, balsamic, and honey, and a salad of orange, carrot, and avocado, with a zesty orange and lime dressing. Jason's guest chef is his own Executive chef in Dubai, who samples some fruity cocktails before creating a delicious lobster and mango dish.

programme.title: Donal's Feasts: Fasts and Festivals S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Episode One sees Donal visit Hare Krishna Island in Lough Erne for a festival, where food offerings to the deities are central to the celebrations.

programme.title: Amazing Hotels: Life Beyond the Lobby S3 Ep2
programme.desc: The Torridon, Scotland - Monica Galetti and Giles Coren visit the Scottish Highlands to spend some time working at The Torridon, Britain's most northerly five-star hotel with a balance of luxury with self-sufficiency.

programme.title: Extraordinary Places to Eat S1 Ep4
programme.desc: San Sebastian - Nisha Katona takes Fred to San Sebastian for a mind-blowing meal at one of the world's top restaurants, and to visit a tiny sports bar to learn the secrets of the perfect tortilla.

programme.title: Grand Designs S21 Ep6
programme.desc: North Cotswolds 2023 - Duncan and Liz bought a plot in the Cotswolds with plans to build a revolutionary eco home. The cathedral-like structure, consisting of walls of triple-glazed windows and three zig-zagging roofs, will be a technically complex challenge.

programme.title: Amazing Hotels: Life Beyond the Lobby S3 Ep2
programme.desc: The Torridon, Scotland - Monica Galetti and Giles Coren visit the Scottish Highlands to spend some time working at The Torridon, Britain's most northerly five-star hotel with a balance of luxury with self-sufficiency.

programme.title: The Great Australian Bake Off S7 Ep6
programme.desc: Cheese Week - Cheese lovers, get ready! Episode 6 brings the much-anticipated Cheese Week, where the remaining bakers must rise to the occasion, crafting mouth-watering cheesy creations that will leave both judges and viewers craving more. With only a few contestants left, this episode promises to be a high-stakes, high-taste challenge, full of drama and, of course, plenty of cheese.

programme.title: My Unique B&B S1 Ep14
programme.desc: Anthony and Bianca's Shed to Shepherd's Hut - Simon travels to Wiltshire to meet Anthony and Bianca who have grand plans to turn the shed at the bottom of their garden into a unique B&B. But those hopes are dashed when expert, Simon Parfett, says it's just too old and rickety to renovate.

programme.title: Malaysia Gourmet With Justine Schofield S1 Ep5
programme.desc: Justine discovers the lush flora of Penang at the tranquil Tropical Spice Garden and then devours a beloved local dish, the oyster omelette. She also visits Tegudon Tourism Village and makes a spicy Malaysian chicken curry with delicious purple rice.

programme.title: The Graham Norton Show S32 Ep2
programme.desc: Series 32, Episode 2 - Graham Norton presents a lively chat show featuring Hugh Grant, Sebastian Stan, Greg Davies and Neneh Cherry.

programme.title: Paul Hollywood Eats Mexico S1 Ep3
programme.desc: The final leg of Paul's culinary voyage is dedicated to liquid-living, as he discovers the American obsession with Mexican coca cola and visits Mexico's most celebrated Mezcal distillery.

programme.title: Rachel Khoo's Chocolat S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Something for Everyone - Rachel goes on a historical and spiritual journey to discover chocolate's universal appeal. Her enticing recipes include chewy, crunchy chocolate cookies.

programme.title: Donal Skehan: Home Cook S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Donal Skehan shows us how to make midweek comfort food, including a mushroom gnocchi, prawn pasta and an air-fryer tofu ramen.

programme.title: Rick Stein's Cornwall S3 Ep10
programme.desc: Series 3, Episode 10 - Rick drops in on the fishing port of Boscastle and finds a fabulous seafood restaurant in a building that once housed rockets used to fire safety ropes out to sinking ships. programme.title: Jason Atherton's Dubai Dishes S1 Ep7

Chef Nick Alvis will be making a delicious sea bass and celeriac dish with a hibiscus infused cream sauce.

programme.title: Jason Atherton's Dubai Dishes S1 Ep8

programme.title: Jason Atherton's Dubai Dishes S1 Ep9
programme.desc: Dubai Innovations - Jason cooks up some classic British and French dishes from his first time in Dubai over 20 years ago. He'll be celebrating his dear friend Gary Rhodes who was THE Dubai innovator. He'll cook up some classic Rhodes dishes, including smoked haddock Welsh rarebit and bread and butter pudding.

programme.title: Jason Atherton's Dubai Dishes S1 Ep10

programme.title: Dawn Of The Croods Ep48
programme.desc: Caverns And Creepers / Rad Teacher - When Eep is kicked out of Thunk's new imaginary role-playing adventure game she decides to play her own, real version of the game; Fed up with Squawk's mean teaching style, Eep has Grug fire him and replace him with Rad, the quintessential young, cool teacher

programme.title: Dawn Of The Croods Ep49
programme.desc: Grugs First Chance / Furry Road - Tired of settling disputes between Valleyites, Grug invents Chance, a two-sided rock that can be flipped to determine all decisions in the Valley; In a nature documentary-style, Thunk tells the story of Beary, a peaceful Thunk-like cub that struggles to fit into a violent bear owl culture

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On! Ep11
programme.desc: The Poppy Horror Picture Show / Dinkles Dinkles Little Star - After hearing a scary story Poppy tries to help Biggie get over his fearsHoping to enhance Mr. Dinkles selfconfidence Biggie enters him into a Bergen pet show.

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On! Ep12
programme.desc: The Party Games / Trolly Tales - Everyone gets excited because its time for the Trolls Annual funbased Party GamesPoppy and Branch try to convince the Troll kids that the library is fun.

programme.title: All Hail King Julien Ep11
programme.desc: My Fair Foosa - To bring peace to his kingdom, King Julien civilizes a Foosa.

programme.title: All Hail King Julien Ep12
programme.desc: Diapers Are The New Black - King Julien discovers diapers and brings style to his lemur subjects, igniting a fashion war.

programme.title: The Epic Tales Of Captain Underpants Ep4
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and The Vexing Villainy of the Vile Vimpire - When Erica makes fun of George and Harolds latest and greatest comic, they make a comic about her becoming a vampire

programme.title: The Epic Tales Of Captain Underpants Ep5
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Terrifying Perilous Misfortune of the T.P. Mummy - After George and Harold T.P. the entire school with toilet paper, they are forced to flush it all down the toilet causing a giant explosion that turns the French teacher into the T.P. Mummy

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots Ep6
programme.desc: Fountains - Puss and Dulcinea embark on an adventure to find the Fountain of Youth to save Puss' old mentor, El Guante Blanco.

programme.title: Not Quite Narwhal Ep6
programme.desc: Playground / Sparkless - Cruz decides to turn the sunken ship into a park. But all his and Kelps fun-crastinating puts the project in jeopardy. / Kelp accidentally knocks a boulder into the stream, blocking the flow while trying his unicorn spark. Frustrated by magic, Kelp uses the narwhal way.

programme.title: Dew Drops Diaries Ep6
programme.desc: The Ticket Trail / Flying Solo - Lola, Dylan and Cassie have tickets to the carnival, but when Dylan loses his ticket, the Dew Drops set out to find it. / When Phoebe accidentally gets tossed into Nicholas' diaper bag before a trip to the park, Phoebe has to help a baby bird, while Eden and Athena must help Marcus rehearse for his big concert.

programme.title: Dragons: Rescue Riders Ep6
programme.desc: Iced Out - Frustrated that she's not fitting in with the team, Aggro goes off on her own with Elbone on a mission to save a dragon egg trapped in ice.

programme.title: Go, Dog. Go! Ep4
programme.desc: Show Dog, Show \ Keys to Victory - Tag can't wait to show off her car at the car show. But when Cheddar Biscuit wants to come along and pick up her clown friends along the way, Tag is wary that Cheddar Biscuit will steal her thunder. \ The Not Yet Cadets can't wait to watch Sams big race. But when Sam loses his car key, he challenges the Not Yet Cadets to race around town to find it.

programme.title: The Epic Tales Of Captain Underpants Ep28
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Angry Abnormal Atrocities of the Astute Animal Agressors - Stuck in separate camps, Harold and George unleash a hyperintelligent talking possum to scare the pants off of Krupp. What could possibly go wrong?

programme.title: Abominable And The Invisible City Ep5
programme.desc: Jin's New Look - On the brink of his highly-anticipated White Coat Ceremony at school, Jin proudly dons his new white doctors coat around town, unwittingly drawing the attention of a creature named Morty. After a slobbery lick from Morty, Jin turns invisible! As Jin frantically tries to become re-visible, he discovers that Morty is very pregnant! Ultimately, Jin foregoes his ceremony and instead delivers Mortys five babies.

programme.title: Abominable And The Invisible City Ep6

Meanwhile, Tina has a plan for Dez to infiltrate the criminal baby organization to break them up from the inside, but its complicated when Tinas new assistant Temp Baby Aubrey accidentally takes over Dezs undercover baby criminal role.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back In The Crib Ep77
programme.desc: The Unshakeable Bear - Boss scours Chicago to find his old co-worker nemesis Board Member Bradley, his key to cutting a deal with the Federal Agents for his freedom. However, he must lose the tail of Canadas most notorious fugitive tracker, a trained bear cub named Henri. Meanwhile, Tina is trapped at home with her paranoid grandma Yaya, forced to prove to her that shes not a criminal baby like the news is causing Yaya to believe.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back In Business Ep6

programme.desc: Yellow 100 - Finally promoted to CEO, Boss Baby sets his sights on achieving 100% Baby Love, while dealing with the annoying Puppies and Preeks who rented Baby Corp office space while Boss was gone. Tim and Danny become local heroes after saving a baby's life.

After a slobbery lick from Morty, Jin turns invisible! As Jin frantically tries to become re-visible, he discovers that Morty is very pregnant! Ultimately, Jin foregoes his ceremony and instead delivers Mortys five babies.

programme.desc: Toad-al Recall - A wish-granting toad drops into Yi and the crews life just as the dumpling shop is being reviewed by a food magazine writer. Overwhelmed by her efforts to help her mom and NaiNai in the shop, Yi asks the toad to spit up helpful items but Jin and Peng arent so selfless. As a result of granting an abundance of wishes for the whole crew, the toad becomes too weak to continue. Realizing the error of their ways and why the toad appeared in the first place, Yi and Everest use their magic to reverse the toads magic onto himself so he can wish himself home.

programme.desc: Costa Rica... IN COLOR! - When Wizard Whitebeard receives a postcard from Costa Rica, Wenda -- a bird-lover with an encyclopedic knowledge of rare birds -- notices that the birds in the postcard have lost their color! Wally and Wenda head to the Costa Rican rain forest to investigate alongside Wizard Featherbeard.

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots Ep2

programme.title: Dinotrux Ep2
programme.desc: Scrapadactyls - When Revvit and his Reptool friends venture out of their ravine, the Dinotrux band together to save them from a flock of savage Scrapadactyls.

programme.desc: Lucky And The Treacherous Trail - When Lucky gets wind of an advanced trail ride she decides to become the best frontier girl anyone has ever seen.overnight

programme.title: Not Quite Narwhal Ep7
programme.desc: Moms Birthday / Angry - Kelp and Scallop enlist Cruzs help to perform a dance for Moms birthday. programme.title: Boss Baby: Back In The Crib Ep55
programme.desc: Turf War - It's a turf war when Bounce House Bruiser Baby encroaches on Delivery Baby's tricycle park! Tina attempts to befriend Bruiser in order to woo her back to the bounce house, but naughty behavior is the only language Bruiser understands. Determined to win this kid over, Tina ends up going rogue as a trike hoodlum, and her own field team is forced to reign her in.

programme.title: Abominable And The Invisible City Ep1

Yis music also calls on Everest, who returns to join the crew and find Fenghuang a suitable home.

Thanks to Tags handiness - and one of Lady Lydias hats - they make it to the party just in time. \ Pawstons new canine mail carrier keeps getting chased by dogs, so Tag and Scooch have to help him deliver the mail.

Meanwhile, Tina's search to find what that swear word means creates unintentional havoc for both Tabitha's research paper and for Baby Corp's online systems when Sheriff Potty Pardner gives them an "internet time out"

programme.desc: Paddington's Puffling Rescue / Paddington Goes Under The Sea - Paddington and the Browns rescue pufflings who, instead of taking their firs flight, get lost around the campsite. Paddington enjoys a diving adventure with Jonatahn and Judy - but where is Judy's necklace

programme.title: Rubble & Crew S02 Ep216

programme.desc: Donuts / Rainbow Salad - Chef attempts to bake Olly's favorite donuts for her surprise birthday breakfast without waking her up.

programme.desc: Pups Save the Dizzy Dust Express / Pups Save the Treetop Trekkers - When the Dizzy Dust Express appears with no one aboard, the Paw Patrol must stop the runaway train and find the missing passengers.

programme.desc: Dino Rescue: Pups and the Lost Dino Eggs - When a lost world of Dinosaurs is discovered, Mayor Humdinger wants to take Dino Eggs back to Foggy Bottom but along the way a baby Brachiosaurus ends up in Dino sized trouble!

programme.desc: The Crew Builds A Ferris Wheel / The Crew Builds A Farm Animal Yoga Space - Rubble & Crew want to give Grocer Gabriel the best beach day ever... including a ride on a brand new Ferris wheel at the boardwalk!

programme.title: DORA S02 Ep201
programme.desc: Big Big Boots / Backpack's Sticky Situation - Boots is too short to go on a ride, so he wishes to be bigger and becomes giant! Dora helps him go back to his normal size.

programme.desc: Dancing with Luke Stars! / Pups Save a Mischievous Octopus - A dance contest being judged by Luke Stars goes wrong when a floating dancefloor carries the contestants away.

programme.desc: Dino Rescue: Pups and the Lost Dino Eggs - When a lost world of Dinosaurs is discovered, Mayor Humdinger wants to take Dino Eggs back to Foggy Bottom but along the way a baby Brachiosaurus ends up in Dino sized trouble!

programme.title: Rubble & Crew S01 Ep120

programme.title: Rubble & Crew S02 Ep217
programme.desc: The Crew Celebrates Builder Covegiving Day / The Crew Builds A Rocket Ship Ride - After Speed Meister sabotages Builder Covegiving Day, it's up to the pups to save the holiday for everyone in Builder Cove.

programme.title: DORA S01 Ep102
programme.desc: Rainbow's Lost Colors / Boots' Rubber Band Ball - The twins are excited to see their first rainbow, but it's missing its colors! Dora sets off to return its azul, rojo, y amarillo.

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines S04 Ep405
programme.desc: The Super-Size Prize - At the Axle City Fair, Blaze and AJ realize they don't have enough coins to use the new Supersize Prize Machine.

programme.title: The Tiny Chef Show S02 Ep203
programme.desc: Turon / Matzo Ball Soup - When the Stump receives a delivery of an unknown fruit, Detectives Chef and Olly must solve the mystery of what it is before they can cook it.

programme.desc: My Fair Sharkdog - Max and Dennis compete to decide whose 'dog' is the best.

programme.title: Sharkdog S01 Ep110
programme.desc: Shark Marks the Spot - Royce wants to go on a treasure hunt with Max, but Max is distracted with Sharkdog.

programme.title: Sharkdog S01 Ep111

programme.title: Peppa Pig S06 Ep601
programme.desc: The Queen - Miss Rabbit is to be given the Queen's Award for Industry, and Peppa and her friends are to accompany her to the palace to meet the Queen!

programme.title: Peppa Pig S06 Ep602
programme.desc: Desert Island - When a fishing trip goes wrong, leaving Grandpa Pig, Granddad Dog, and Grampy Rabbit stranded on a desert island, Captain Daddy Dog is the only one able to save them.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S06 Ep603
programme.desc: Perfume - After smelling Granny Pig's perfume de lavender, Peppa experiments with the flowers in the garden to create her own special smell.

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep154
programme.desc: No Panic ! - Christopher needs to warn Froga to protect her strawberries since he ears a thunderstorm coming! It turns out, the noise of thunder comes from Bubu's new invention: the weather machine!

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep155
programme.desc: Ron's Sunburn - Ron has gotten a terrible sunburn and is too embarrassed to come outside and play with his friends. They try everything they can think of to get him to play with them.

programme.title: The Tiny Chef Show S01 Ep104
programme.desc: Pancakes / S'Mores - Tiny Chef makes pancakes but loses his confidence when he breaks his special lucky pancake flipping spatula.

programme.title: The Tiny Chef Show S02 Ep209
programme.desc: Dumplings - Chef and Olly are making dumplings, but when first-timer Olly is better at making them, Chef must regain his confidence in his folding skills.

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines S08 Ep807
programme.desc: Tool Truck Blaze - When three construction emergencies break out all over town, Blaze must save the day by becoming: Tool Truck Blaze!

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines S01 Ep112
programme.desc: The Mystery Bandit - When a mysterious bandit makes off with Blazes metallic trophy, he must track down the culprit in this preschool whodunit!

programme.title: Rubble & Crew S01 Ep108
programme.desc: The Crew Fixes A Slippery Mess - A soapy accident causes slippery mayhem all over Builder Cove. Can the pups clean it up in time for Mayor Greatway's big jump?

programme.title: DORA S02 Ep201
programme.desc: Big Big Boots / Backpack's Sticky Situation - Boots is too short to go on a ride, so he wishes to be bigger and becomes giant! Dora helps him go back to his normal size.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S5 Ep3
programme.desc: The Transport Badge - When Duggee's old friend Rhodri goes home after a visit, he forgets his favourite hat. The Squirrels take an epic journey to give it back.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S5 Ep4
programme.desc: The Talent Badge - Out for a walk, the Squirrels spot an interesting poster - it's King Tiger advertising his Roar Talent Show. Naturally, the Squirrels are very keen to take part.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S5 Ep5
programme.desc: The Mime Badge - Duggee is encouraging the Squirrels to come outside by gesturing through the window. They don't understand what he's doing and think it's funny. When he comes inside, he explains that he was miming.

programme.title: Go Jetters S2 Ep34
programme.desc: Go Jet Academy: Mudslide - It's a very rainy day at the Go Jet Academy and the Go Jetters are teaching the Cadets some crucial Go Jetter skills.

programme.title: Go Jetters S2 Ep35
programme.desc: The Great Pacific Garbage Patch - When a storm washes up plastic litter onto the Academy beach, the Go Jetters leave Ubercorn, Grandmaster Glitch and the cadets behind and head to the North Pacific Ocean in Jet Pad.

programme.title: Bluey S3 Ep4
programme.desc: Omelette - Bingo is helping Mum make an omelette for Dad's birthday breakfast, but cracking eggs is harder than it looks, and Dad is getting hungrier by the minute.

programme.title: Bluey S3 Ep5
programme.desc: Born Yesterday - Dad pretends he was born yesterday. Bluey and Bingo have to guide him through his second day on Earth, especially when he discovers food is delicious and steals Lucky's Dad's pie.

programme.title: Bluey S3 Ep6
programme.desc: Mini Bluey - When Dad complains about how dissimilar Bluey and Bingo are, Bluey hatches a plan to make them more alike and happily introduces Mini-Bluey!

programme.title: Teletubbies S1 Ep101
programme.desc: Bottom Bump - The Teletubbies bottom bounce on The Tubby Bouncy before wiggling their bottoms to a special bottom bump song.

programme.title: Teletubbies Ready Steady Go! S1 Ep4
programme.desc: Best Friend Song - Join the dance party with the Teletubbies! Tinky Winky, Dipsy, Laa-Laa and Po dance and sing the Best Friend Song with their school friends.

programme.title: Pop Paper City S1 Ep30
programme.desc: Planet Pop Beam - The friends travel into outer space to visit Planet Popbeam. Mae-Mae wonders if the planet is made of cheese, but Phoebe thinks it's made of rock.

programme.title: Dog Loves Books S1 Ep10
programme.desc: Dog Loves Night - The lights in the shop go out and Dog and Pug share an adventure seeing all the nocturnal activities around them - bats, cats and foxes. Finally they see the night workers who are repairing the problem.

programme.title: Messy goes to OKIDO S1 Ep41
programme.desc: Messy Music - Messy and friends must play the OKIDO concert. It's time for OKIDO to make some noise.

programme.title: Messy goes to OKIDO S1 Ep42
programme.desc: A Sock Too Far - When Messy and his friends go camping with a robot who can do anything, there is a giant-sized sock accident!

programme.title: Kazoops! S1 Ep56
programme.desc: Bath Night - Monty is avoiding taking a bath and wonders if you really need to get wet to get clean.

programme.title: JoJo & Gran Gran S1 Ep32
programme.desc: It's time for a treasure hunt - JoJo and Gran Gran join Jaxon and Ezra in the park for Cynthia's pirate-themed treasure hunt. Who will be the first to find the treasure? Come on, shipmates, and set sail with JoJo and Gran Gran!

programme.title: JoJo & Gran Gran S1 Ep31
programme.desc: It's time for a birthday party - When JoJo learns that Jared was too busy to have a birthday party, Gran Gran has a Gran Gran Plan to throw Jared a surprise belated birthday party!

programme.title: Sarah and Duck S2 Ep40
programme.desc: Duck Flies - Duck sees some flying, migrating ducks in the sky and decides he would like to try it too.

programme.title: Sarah and Duck S3 Ep1
programme.desc: Picture Planes - When Sarah and Duck are racing paper planes, they chance upon an exciting discovery.

programme.title: Thomas & Friends S24 Ep10
programme.desc: Ace's Brave Jump - Thomas is in Australia where racing car Ace is planning a big jump across lots of buses.

programme.title: Bluey S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Magic Xylophone - As Bluey and Bingo squabble over their magic xylophone, Dad seizes control and freezes Bluey, leaving Bingo as her only hope.

programme.title: Bluey S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Hospital - Doctor Bluey is needed when Dad gets a very curious x-ray from Nurse Bingo. It seems he has a cat in his tummy!

programme.title: Bluey S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Keepy Uppy - Bluey, Bingo and Mum are enjoying playing Keepy-Uppy around the house, when Dad joins in and the game becomes the ultimate test of skill.

programme.title: Supertato S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Cheese Moon - It's a space race as Supertato helps Carrot fly her baguette rocket to be the first Veggie on the Cheese Moon but half way there Evil Pea crashes into them making them crash land.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S4 Ep17
programme.desc: The Dream Badge - The Squirrels are playing, but they can't stop thinking about the dreams they had last night. Duggee has his dream badge, so can he help the squirrels work out what their dreams mean.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S4 Ep18
programme.desc: The Eating Badge - The Squirrels are having a picnic and notice that the chickens eat differently than they do. Duggee has his eating badge and can explain all the different ways animals eat.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S4 Ep19
programme.desc: The Delivery Badge - Chipmunk is cycling one day delivering his packages when he hits a rock and his trike falls apart! He has so many packages to deliver - what is he going to do now?

programme.title: Go Jetters S3 Ep2
programme.desc: Fatberg, London Sewers, England - Glitch and the Grimbots create some enormous blockages after flushing wet wipes.

programme.title: Go Jetters S3 Ep3
programme.desc: Monteverde Cloud Forest, Costa Rica - Can the Go Jetters save a rare bird's nest and find a lost trophy?

programme.title: Go Jetters S3 Ep4
programme.desc: The Continent of Africa - Glitch takes Tala to the continent of Africa to help her with an Academy project.

programme.desc: Rush! Rush! Rush! - Krash is waiting for the Jack to spring out from the box. However he misses it every time.
