programme.title: Perayaan Raya Aidilfitri 2025 Kementerian Perpaduan Negara
programme.desc: Bagi membudayakan perpaduan dalam perayaan, Kementerian Perpaduan Negara (KPN) telah menerbitkan sebuah iklan khas sempena perayaan Hari Raya Aidilfitri tahun 2025. Iklan ini bertujuan untuk memupuk pemahaman mendalam serta meningkatkan semangat perpaduan dalam kalangan rakyat Malaysia mengenai kepelbagaian bahasa, adat resam, budaya, dan kesenian masyarakat berbilang kaum di negara ini.

programme.title: NHK Newsline
programme.desc: NHK WORLD-JAPAN's flagship hourly news program delivers the latest world news, business and weather, with a focus on Japan and the rest of Asia.

programme.title: Lafcadio Hearn
programme.desc: Writer Lafcadio Hearn introduced Japanese culture to the world around 130 years age, in books that faithfully depicted the country's traditions. We explore the cultural journey of this world traveler.

programme.title: The Beauty Of Japanese Swords
programme.desc: Japanese swords, admired since ancient times for their beauty, are amazing works of art. This time, Izumi no Kami Kanesada, the much-loved sword of Hijikata Toshizo, the "Shogun's last samurai."

programme.title: NHK Newsline
programme.desc: NHK WORLD-JAPAN's flagship hourly news program delivers the latest world news, business and weather, with a focus on Japan and the rest of Asia.

programme.title: Hometown Stories
programme.desc: There is a mosque in western Japan where local Muslims gather to pray and seek help when they are troubled. For them, the mosque is like a second home that provides happiness and emotional support.

programme.title: Easy Japanese
programme.desc: #14 I want to go to Japan someday. / A verb with "te mitai desu" means "want to do something that you haven't done before." "Nihon e itte mitai desu" means "I want to go to Japan someday."

programme.title: Treasure Box Japan: Toyama- Iwase
programme.desc: At the Iwase Hikiyama Festival held in May in the Iwase district, floats topped with ornate displays are pulled around town then made to collide into one another as an offering to the local deity.

programme.title: Wild Hokkaido!
programme.desc: Enjoy horse trekking through a lakeside forest in freshly fallen snow. An uphill course on horseback rewards riders with spectacular views above Lake Toya, one of Hokkaido's scenic caldera lakes.

programme.title: NHK Newsline
programme.desc: NHK WORLD-JAPAN's flagship hourly news program delivers the latest world news, business and weather, with a focus on Japan and the rest of Asia.

programme.title: Documentary 360
programme.desc: NHK WORLD-JAPAN's flagship documentary series offers must-see episodes on politics, the economy, social trends, science and the environment in Japan and beyond.

programme.title: Is That Picture Real?
programme.desc: A billion cats are on the loose!? An online post throws the father into a panic. How should we interact with online information when fake images are on the rise, especially during disasters?

programme.title: NHK Newsline
programme.desc: NHK WORLD-JAPAN's flagship hourly news program delivers the latest world news, business and weather, with a focus on Japan and the rest of Asia.

programme.title: My Job In Japan 2025
programme.desc: We compile some of the best stories about foreign workers in Japan. Some support traditional industries like soy sauce and pottery, while others start businesses with a non-Japanese perspective.

programme.title: NHK Newsline
programme.desc: NHK WORLD-JAPAN's flagship hourly news program delivers the latest world news, business and weather, with a focus on Japan and the rest of Asia.

programme.title: Cycle Around Japan Highlights
programme.desc: In the first of a new series exploring Japan's pre-modern network of highways, we discover the unique culture they inspired as we ride from Fukui to Niigata on part of the 400km Old Hokuriku Kaido.

programme.title: Herbal Symphony #5
programme.desc: In Uda, discover Japan's oldest private medicinal herb garden, where the natural landscape from 300 years ago is preserved in a botanical time capsule, a sanctuary of the local culture and history.

programme.title: Impacts: Climates Change The World
programme.desc: Emissions of methane gas, which has a strong effect on global warming, are at a peak. In Japan, where 40% of methane emissions come from rice farming, finding a solution is of great importance.

programme.desc: NHK WORLD-JAPAN's flagship hourly news program delivers the latest world news, business and weather, with a focus on Japan and the rest of Asia.

programme.title: Lafcadio Hearn
programme.desc: Writer Lafcadio Hearn introduced Japanese culture to the world around 130 years age, in books that faithfully depicted the country's traditions. We explore the cultural journey of this world traveler.

programme.title: The Beauty Of Japanese Swords
programme.desc: Japanese swords, admired since ancient times for their beauty, are amazing works of art. This time, Izumi no Kami Kanesada, the much-loved sword of Hijikata Toshizo, the "Shogun's last samurai."

programme.title: NHK Newsline
programme.desc: NHK WORLD-JAPAN's flagship hourly news program delivers the latest world news, business and weather, with a focus on Japan and the rest of Asia.

programme.title: Newsline In Depth
programme.desc: Introducing a colorful variety of feature stories, including reports on daily life from locations throughout Japan, as well as other parts of Asia and around the world.

programme.title: Chatroom Japan #2
programme.desc: "50 rejections changed my life." Marvin is from Brunei. He now works as a data analyst after he was turned down by 50 companies in his job search. What insight did he gain from his experience?

programme.title: Where We Call Home
programme.desc: We meet Uganda-born Kalule Deogratius who teaches English at a middle school in Nagano, and Vietnamese Nguyen Cong Quoc who works at a mandarin orange farm in Ehime.

programme.title: NHK Newsline
programme.desc: NHK WORLD-JAPAN's flagship hourly news program delivers the latest world news, business and weather, with a focus on Japan and the rest of Asia.

programme.title: Time-Lapse Japan
programme.desc: The Jomon period dates roughly from 13,000 to 300 BC. We examine various aspects of Jomon society, with footage from time-lapse creator Shimizu Daisuke. This time: Dogu.

programme.title: Cinematic Journey
programme.desc: Kyle Card hikes along the 1000km trail following the Pacific Coast in northern Japan where he discovers local lifestyles, stunning nature, traces of the area's 2011 disaster, and resilient people.

programme.title: Activate Your Japanese!
programme.desc: Learn how to make the most of your Japanese skills. Watch our drama that features useful communication strategies, our snappy videos about onomatopoeia, and our documentaries on "senpai" in Japan.

programme.title: Bosai: Be Prepared
programme.desc: What preparations are needed to protect children in the event of a disaster? This episode considers not only their physical safety, but also their mental well-being during stressful evacuation.

programme.title: UFC Main Event EpUFC306OMalleyvsDvalishvili
programme.desc: For the first time ever, Sphere Las Vegas hosts the UFC, as devastating striker Suga Sean OMalley defends his title for the second time against the indomitable wrestler Merab The Machine Dvalishvili.

programme.title: UFC The Walk EpUFC262
programme.desc: Oliveira vs Chandler - In 2021, UFC veteran Charles Oliveira and highly-touted newcomer Michael Chandler competed for the vacant lightweight title. Watch both athletes' journeys to the Octagon and relive Charles' historic come-back performance to claim the belt.

programme.title: UFC Unleashed Ep1801
programme.desc: British Invasion - Its a British invasion of the world-famous Octagon as the top stars from across the pond show off their incredible skills on UFC Unleashed. Featuring Tom Aspinall, Meatball Molly McCann, and Paddy The Baddy Pimblett.

programme.title: LALIGA TOP MOMENTS GERARD PIQUE
programme.desc: LALIGA TOP MOMENTS GERARD PIQUE - A towering presence at the back and a potent attacking force upfront. Complete domination by Barcelona club captain Gerard Pique.

programme.title: UFC Reloaded EpUFC300PereiravsHill
programme.desc: Over 30 years in the making, UFC celebrates its 300th numbered event with 3 title fights and a stacked card. Alex Pereira defends his Light Heavyweight belt againt former champ Jamahal Hill, Zhang Weili puts her Strawweight title on the line against Yan Xiaonan in the first ever UFC China vs China championship bout, and Justin Gaethje battles Max Holloway to keep his coveted BMF belt. Catch all this and much more on UFC Reloaded.

programme.title: Mencari Ramli Musim Ke - 4 Ep3
programme.desc: Program pencarian bakat bola sepak yang hebat diteruskan lagi dengan Musim Ke-4. Program ini memberi peluang kepada bakat muda untuk merealisasikan impian mereka menjadi pemain bola sepak terbaik di peringkat kebangsaan dan antarabangsa. Program ini mencungkil bakat bola sepak anak-anak muda berusia bawah 14 tahun dan bawah 16 tahun.

programme.title: Sensasi Bola Ep20
programme.desc: Sensasi Bola merupakan satu program bual bicara berdurasi setengah jam bersama pemain bola sepak, selebriti, jurulatih dan peminat sebagai tetamu undangan setiap minggu.
